liste.punkt: You search on the sham Requirements for pregnancy allowance for self-employed and freelancers. Both you and the doctor or midwife must complete the form.
Doctor or midwife assesses the risk of the unborn child. You must consider for yourself whether you can arrange your job so that there is no risk for the child.
Along with the application form, you submit the form Income information for self-employed / freelancer.

innhold.avsnitt: Here you will find all application forms for pregnancy allowance
